title: Instructional Design Simulation-Based Workshop for Integrating Sociocultural Issues in IDT Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories, technology application experience, and basic understanding of multicultural environments
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education using VR devices and mobile learning platforms. Emphasizes the role of IDT project leaders in corporate language education

learning_goals: Develop three or more instructional design scenarios reflecting sociocultural issues via VR simulations
Implement a survey design and execution process for sociocultural issue analysis in mobile environments with 80% accuracy
Apply a cultural sensitivity assessment framework to improve instructional materials during IDT projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
